snippet: A man who was punched in the head over the weekend while refereeing an adult-league soccer match in suburban Detroit died Tuesday, the authorities said.
abstract: Michigan man John Bieniewicz dies after being punched in the head while refereeing an adult-league soccer match in suburban Detroit; Baseel Abdul-Amir Saad of Dearborn is arraigned on assault charge that could be upgraded.
lead_paragraph: A man who was punched in the head over the weekend while refereeing an adult-league soccer match in suburban Detroit died Tuesday, the authorities said.

headline.main: Michigan: Soccer Referee Dies After Attack in Game, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Soccer Referee Dies After Attack in Game, Police Say
